# UITextLayoutDirection

**Enumeration**

The direction of text layout.

## Declaration

```swift
enum UITextLayoutDirection
```

## Overview

Constants of this type are used as arguments in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextInput/position(from:in:offset:)], [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextInput/position(within:farthestIn:)], and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextInput/characterRange(byExtending:in:)] methods.

## Constants

- **UITextLayoutDirection.right**: Layout of the text to the right.
- **UITextLayoutDirection.left**: Layout of the text to the left.
- **UITextLayoutDirection.up**: Layout of the text in an upward direction.
- **UITextLayoutDirection.down**: Layout of the text in a downward direction.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **UITextDirection**: The direction of the text.
- **UITextStorageDirection**: The direction of text storage.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
